TEST.0.title: North Carolina Division A Sample - November 2021

CIPHER.88.cipherString: Ideas shape the course of history.
CIPHER.88.question: Solve this Tap Code Cipher, which is a good observation by John Maynard Keynes

CIPHER.94.cipherString: I'd learned that some things are best kept secret.
CIPHER.94.question: Solve this PigPen cipher which is a quote by Nicholas Sparks.

CIPHER.91.cipherString: Cooking food is a science but making people hungry is an art
CIPHER.91.question: Solve this Caesar Cipher from Myra Yadav.

CIPHER.86.cipherString: Science, in the very act of solving problems, creates more of them.
CIPHER.86.question: The following quote by Abraham Flexner needs to be decoded with the Vigenère Cipher with a keyword of WORK

CIPHER.84.cipherString: I know all those words, but that sentence makes no sense to me.
CIPHER.84.question: Solve this Caesar Cipher from Matt Groening.

CIPHER.93.cipherString: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
CIPHER.93.question: Solve this Aristocrat with a quote from Ralph Waldo Emerson about the future.  The word WHAT appears three times.

CIPHER.85.cipherString: Our true mentor in life is science.
CIPHER.85.question: Solve this Tapcode cipher which is a quote from Mustafa Kemal Atatürk.

CIPHER.95.cipherString: And the only way to do great work is to love what you do.... Don't settle.
CIPHER.95.question: The following advice from Steve Jobs needs to be decoded with the Vigenère Cipher with a keyword of HOPE.

CIPHER.90.cipherString: Life is short. Focus on what really matters most. You have to change your priorities over time.
CIPHER.90.question: Solve this Aristocrat cipher which is advice from Roy T. Bennett which ends with the word TIME.

CIPHER.92.cipherString: Climate is what you expect, weather is what you get.
CIPHER.92.question: Solve this Atbash cipher which is a quote from Robert A. Heinlein.

CIPHER.87.cipherString: Success is only possible to those whose hearts are willing and ready to embrace hard work.
CIPHER.87.question: Solve this Aristocrat cipher which is some good advice from Topsy Gift.  The second word is IS.

CIPHER.89.cipherString: Do no harm and leave the world a better place than you found it.
CIPHER.89.question: Solve this PigPen cipher which has some good advice from Patricia Cornwell.
